participant_1.background:
I enjoy listening to the music of Katy Perry as it reminds me of my younger years.
I drive a minivan because it's roomy and comfortable for my family.
I love the website The Spruce because it has so many great tips for cleaning everything in my home, including my glasses!
i am afraid of the dark.
I used to be afraid to speak my mind, but now I am more confident in expressing my opinions.

participant_2.background:
I am grateful for my family, and I enjoy spending time with them on holidays.
I will do laundry and spend time with my family.
I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.
i am a grandparent at 44.
I love to feel the warm sun on my skin and the salty sea air in my hair.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Hello, I am doing well today. How are you?
I am doing well too. Thank you for asking. I am listening to some music by Katy Perry right now.
I love Katy Perry! She is one of my favorite artists. I have seen her in concert twice.
That is awesome! I have not seen her in concert yet, but I would love to.
You should definitely go if you get the chance. She puts on a great show.
I will definitely keep that in mind. Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome. What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends. I also enjoy reading, writing, and playing video games.
Those all sound like great hobbies. I love to read and play video games too.
Me too! What are some of your favorite video games?
I really like the Legend of Zelda series. I have also been enjoying the new Mario games.
I love the Legend of Zelda games too! They are so much fun. I have not played any of the new Mario games yet, but I have heard good things about them.
You should definitely check them out. They are a lot of fun.
I will definitely do that. Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome. It was nice talking to you.
It was nice talking to you too. Have a great day!
